name: @ngx-meta/bundle-size
description: ngx-meta lib bundle size analysis with source-map-explorer

scripts.sme-json:a15: mkdir -p a15 && pnpm run --silent analyze-main-bundle:a15 --json > a15/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.sme-json:a16: mkdir -p a16 && pnpm run --silent analyze-main-bundle:a16 --json > a16/source-map-explorer.json
scripts.sme-json:a17: mkdir -p a17 && pnpm run --silent analyze-main-bundle:a17 --json > a17/source-map-explorer.json
